input.name: storageLocation
input.label: User-submitted data: Storage location and access policy

config.option: Minimal: No storage, only send the data by e-mail
Regular: Also store the data on the server, but only available in reports
Full: Data is stored as content underneath the form in Content Studio

input.help-text: If "Minimal" is selected, each form MUST have a working e-mail address to send the data to, or else data will be lost if the e-mail isn't sent. "Regular" and "Full" will enable running reports with the widget. "Full" provides the most control over the data but might fill up Content Studio with thousands of form responses if a form is popular and the responses are not removed periodically.

input.name: style
input.label: Form style
input.help-text: Select global styling for forms generated with the formbuilder app. If "Browser default" is used, no extra style sheet is loaded with the page, and the browser uses whatever CSS styling has been applied to the page for that type of HTML markup. "Twitter Bootstrap" currently uses v.3.3.5.
